product_name: Seattle Sports Camp Sink - Special Buy
long_description: The 25-liter Seattle Sports Camp Sink is great for washing dishes, laundry or yourself while you're in the backcountry. Plus, it collapses for easy storage. Constructed with rugged vinyl-coated nylon and a heavy-duty bottom. Semi-rigid perimeter ring keeps the top open for easy use. Nylon webbing handles are easy to grip while carrying water from source to camp. Special buy.
short_description: The 25-liter Seattle Sports Camp Sink is great for washing dishes, laundry or yourself while you're in the backcountry. Plus, it collapses for easy storage.
